headline: A Look At AvalonBay Communities (AVB) Valuation As Revenue Rises But Net Income Slips
summary: Why AvalonBay Communities is on investors’ radar today AvalonBay Communities (AVB) is drawing attention after a mixed fundamental picture, with annual revenue growth of 5.27% alongside a 5.45% decline in net income. This combination is prompting fresh questions about how the REIT is being valued in the market. See our latest analysis for AvalonBay Communities. headline: Waterfall Asset Management Takes Stake in National Storage Affiliates as Higher Rates Reshape REIT Growth
summary: Waterfall Asset Management has opened a new position in National Storage Affiliates, a self-storage REIT with properties across major U.S. markets. With rent growth cooling from pandemic highs and borrowing costs still elevated, acquisition-driven growth no longer carries the easy tailwinds it once did.
